export const useTranslation = (language = 'fr') => {
  const t = key => {
    const keys = key.split('.');
    let value = translations[language];
    for (const k of keys) {
      var _value;
      value = (_value = value) === null || _value === void 0 ? void 0 : _value[k];
    }
    return value || key;
  };
  return {
    t
  };
};
export default translations;

export const translations = {

    },

    // Page d'accueil
    home: {

export const useTranslation = (language = 'fr') => {
  const t = (key) => {
    const keys = key.split('.');
    let value = translations[language];
    for (const k of keys) {
      value = value?.[k];
    }
    return value || key;
  };
  return { t };
};

export default translations;
